reference.text: moulding refractory materials in general B28B

note.note-paragraph: This subclass covers:- the making of moulds for casting metals or of other refractory moulds;- selection or preparation of materials therefor;- the necessary patterns, processes, machines, accessory devices or tools.

subnote.note-paragraph:
The following IPC groups are not used in the CPC scheme. Subject matter covered by these groups is classified in the following CPC groups:
B22C3/02 covered by B22C3/00
B22C5/13 covered by B22C5/12
B22C7/05 covered by B22C7/04
B22C9/11 covered by B22C9/10
B22C9/14 covered by B22C9/12
B22C9/16 covered by B22C9/12
B22C15/264 to B22C15/276 covered by B22C15/23
B22C19/01 covered by B22C19/00

title-part.text: Compositions of refractory mould or core materials
Chemical or physical features in the formation or manufacture of moulds
characterised by additives for special purposes, e.g. indicators, break-down additives
for protection of the casting, e.g. against decarbonisation
for decreasing shrinkage of the mould, e.g. for investment casting
for influencing the hardening tendency of the mould material

reference.text: influencing the hardening tendency of the binding agent only B22C1/16

title-part.text: for manufacturing permanent moulds or cores
for separating the pattern from the mould
characterised by the use of binding agents

CPC-specific-text.text: use of a gaseous treating agent for hardening the binder
in the manufacture of multilayered shell moulds
Mixtures of inorganic and organic binding agents
containing phosphates, phosphoric acids or its derivatives
contaming ammonium or metal silicates, silica sols
of organic silicon or metal compounds, other organometallic compounds
obtained by reactions only involving carbon-to-carbon unsaturated bonds
obtained otherwise than by reactions only involving carbon-to-carbon unsaturated bonds
Condensation polymers of aldehydes and ketones

title-part.text: Selection of compositions for coating the surfaces of moulds, cores, or patterns
Machines or devices specially designed for dressing or handling the mould material so far as specially adapted for that purpose

reference.text: of general applicability, see the relevant places, e.g. for material with water-setting properties B28C

title-part.text: Dressing by centrifuging essentially or additionally
by grinding, blending, mixing, kneading, or stirring

CPC-specific-text.text: Stirring by using vibrations while grinding
Blending, mixing, kneading or stirring; Methods therefor
Horizontal mixing and conveying units, e.g. the unit being rotatable about a vertical axis, or having a supplementary mixing house with a vertical axis at its end

Devices having a fixed receptable with rotating tools, some or all of these tools being rolls or balls loosely mounted on their axis or loose balls in contact with the side wall or the bottom of the receptacle, e.g. with aerating means; "Devices of the Muller type"
having only one vertical tool-driving shaft
having at least two vertical tool-driving shafts
Devices having a vertical stirrer shaft in a fixed receptacle
the material flowing continuously through the device
Devices having a horizontal stirrer shaft in a fixed receptacle
with bottom disc rotating about a vertical axis or with receptacle rotating about a vertical or steeply inclined axis, e.g. with fixed or driven tools, such as rolls
with a receptacle rotating about a horizontal or slightly inclined axis, e.g. with fixed or rotating tools
having feeding moulds, e.g. using gas
Parts; Accessories; Controlling; Feeding; Discharging; Proportioning
Mixing while transporting the mixture on an endless belt, e.g. with driven stirring elements
Movable devices for cutting or mixing material laying on the ground
combined with another operation, e.g. sieving, or with means for picking up material from the ground
Cooling or drying the sand together with the castings

reference.text: in combination with compacting B22C15/20 to B22C15/28

title-part.text: Equipment for storing or handling the dressed mould material, forming part of a plant for preparing such material
with conveyers or other equipment for feeding the material
Manufacture thereof so far as not provided for in other classes

CPC-specific-text.text: Adjustable, sectional, expandable or flexible patterns
Patterns made from expanded plastic materials

reference.text: joining of plastics, in general B29C65/00
uniquely adapted to particular casting processes B22D
processes involving the use of particular moulding machines, see the relevant groups for these machines

title-part.text: Sand moulds or like moulds for shaped castings

CPC-specific-text.text: Use of patterns which are eliminated by the liquid metal in the mould
Materials which make up the mould
Mechanisms for locking or opening moulds
Cooling or heating equipment for moulds

title-part.text: Features with respect to supply of molten metal, e.g. ingates, circular gates, skim gates
Treating moulds or cores, e.g. drying, hardening
Stack moulds, i.e. arrangement of multiple moulds or flasks
Moulding machines for making moulds or cores
Moulding machines characterised by the relative arrangement of the parts of same
Machines in which the moulds are moved during a cycle of successive operations
by a horizontal rotary table or carrier
by non-rotary conveying means, e.g. by travelling platforms
with one or more flasks forming part of the machine, from which only the sand moulds made by compacting are removed
Moulding machines for making moulds or cores of particular shapes
equipped with templates, e.g. for sweeping operation
with rotary templates, e.g. arranged on a pillar
with non-rotary template and rotary flask
for shell moulds or shell cores
for pipes or elongated hollow articles
Moulding machines characterised by the compacting mechanism
involving muscle power, e.g. hand-operated levers
involving mechanical gearings, e.g. crank gears
the machine having special provision for reducing shock to its frame
Compacting by centrifugal forces only, e.g. in sand slingers
Compacting by gas pressure or vacuum
involving blowing devices in which the mould material is supplied in the form of loose particles
involving propulsion devices in which the mould material is supplied in the shape of a compacted column or the like
Compacting by different means acting simultaneously or successively, e.g. preliminary blowing and finally pressing
by both pressing and jarring devices
involving pneumatic or hydraulic mechanisms only
Moulding machines characterised by the mechanism for separating the pattern from the mould or for turning over the flask or the pattern plate
Moulding machines with pin lifting arrangement
Moulding machines with mechanisms to turn over the pattern plate on the mould around a horizontal axis
Turning-over pattern plate and flask only
Turning-over pattern plate, flask, and compacting device as a unit
arranged to one side of the mould table, so-called roll-over table moulding machines
Components or accessories for moulding machines
Controlling devices specially designed for moulding machines
Devices for rapping or loosening the pattern
Sectional flasks, i.e. with divided, articulated, or interchangeable side sections
for reinforcing or securing moulding materials or cores, e.g. gaggers, chaplets, pins, bars
Devices not mentioned before for moulding
Devices for coating moulds or cores

reference.text: for preparing mould materials B22C5/18; in combination with casting plants B22D47/02
